and that means a lot of latency for compute tasks that require the same data sets
This latency is a necessary evil in the design of multiprocessor systems
because of the need for Non-Uniform Memory Access (NUMA) for short
That allows these two processors to efficiently share resources or as efficiently as they can
So the short version of this is that it works by transparently allocating devices and memory to each CPU
which means they can more easily avoid interrupting each other while accessing those resources
